name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive expertise in **DevOps**, **automated deployment**, **CI/CD**, and **cloud** environments, leveraging strong skills in **microservices** architecture. Proficient in deploying scalable applications using **Kubernetes**, and adept at managing infrastructure with **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Helm**, ensuring robust and efficient operations.
Solid programming foundations in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Java**, with hands-on experience in **Go** and **C#** support the agile development of transformative solutions.
Demonstrated success in building and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while implementing **Software as a Service (SaaS)** models and adhering to compliance standards. A forward-thinking technologist with a strong commitment to enhancing operational efficiency through skilled **GitOps** practices and fostering innovative solutions within open-source ecosystems.
